constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 23 (Monday, February 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GOHMERT:
H.R. 931.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3, providing Congress the
authority to regulate Commerce with Foreign Nations, and
among the Several States, and with Indian Tribes
[Page H483]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Antitrust, Commercial, and Administrative Law.

title: Public Water Supply Invasive Species Compliance Act of 2021
